      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800318">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800318">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800318">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800318">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800318" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800319">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800319">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800319">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800319">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800319" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800320">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800320">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800320">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works for Bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800320">
          <div id="boxatt21800320" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25279009">
              <a id="link_25279009" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxfordâ€™s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25283466">
              <a id="link_25283466" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25283466,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24940522}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Useful in particular for the reference lists that accompany many of the entries: popular and sometimes scholarly sources.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800321">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800321">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800321">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800321">
          <div id="boxatt21800321" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25279013">
              <a id="link_25279013" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279013,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279014">
              <a id="link_25279014" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279014,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800322">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800322">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800322">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Newspapers
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800322">
          <p>
           Newspapers and other popular periodicals
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800322" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25279015">
              <a id="link_25279015" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279015,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. A reliable source from full text newspapers from around the world. From within the database, choose: News. Then choose the source (e.g. Major World Newspaper) and then specify the date range.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279016">
              <a id="link_25279016" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/34107580" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279016,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275262}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access to the archive of the New York Times from 1857-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279017">
              <a id="link_25279017" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279017,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767763}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800323">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800323">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800323">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journal Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800323">
          <p>
           Scholarly journals in art history and specialized art magazines
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800323" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25279022">
              <a id="link_25279022" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279022,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279018">
              <a id="link_25279018" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279018,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription database
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279020">
              <a id="link_25279020" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279020,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Good starting place for art journals and specialty art magazines, and includes the full text of many. Indexes and/or includes the full text of specialty art magazines such as Art in America Artforum, Apollo, Burlington Magazine, October, Modern Painters, Women Artists News.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279019">
              <a id="link_25279019" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279019,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription database
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279023">
              <a id="link_25279023" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279023,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25279021">
              <a id="link_25279021" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25279021,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Gender &amp; Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. An archive for many scholarly journals including some in art history. Includes these women's studies journals full-text: Signs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5775836" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21800325">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800325">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800325">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources (and annotated bibiographies)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800325">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies in the MLA style, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            Online Writing Lab
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/general/gl_annotatedbib.html">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and proper
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/general/gl_annotatedbibEX.html">
            format
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Ask Kelly if you have questions about this.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800325" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21800326">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21800326">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21800326">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21800326">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21800326" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
